query:
WITH dept_totals AS (
    SELECT 
        department,
        SUM(salary) as total_salary,
        COUNT(*) as employee_count
    FROM employees
    GROUP BY department
)
SELECT 
    department,
    total_salary,
    employee_count,
    ROUND(total_salary / employee_count, 2) as avg_salary
FROM dept_totals
ORDER BY total_salary DESC
